report.title: Surveys list
report.description: A general purpose list of surveys.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM surveys s JOIN websites w on w.id=s.website_id AND w.deleted=false #joins# WHERE s.website_id in (#sharing_website_ids#) #filters# AND s.deleted=false #order_by#

column.name: fulltitle
column.sql: case when lower(substr(s.title, 1, length(w.title))) = lower(w.title) then s.title else w.title || ' ' || s.title end
